SMW Subobject for (1)High Alchemy value: 0Examine: Boosts your skills when drunk.Is members only: falseIs variant of: Castlewars brewUses infobox: ItemImage: File:Castlewars brew(1).pngWeight: 0.035Value: 1Version anchor: 1 doseRelease date: 2 December 2020Item ID: 25162

A Castlewars brew is a potion exclusive to Castle Wars. It provides the boosts from a super combat potion, a ranging potion and imbued heart at once.

Effects[edit | edit source]

Stat boosts to Attack, Strength and Defence are calculated with: ⌊ S k i l l L e v e l × 15 100 ⌋ + 5 {\displaystyle \lfloor SkillLevel\times {\frac {15}{100}}\rfloor +5} .

Ranged boost is calculated with: ⌊ R a n g e d L e v e l × 1 10 ⌋ + 4 {\displaystyle \lfloor RangedLevel\times {\frac {1}{10}}\rfloor +4}

Magic boost is calculated with: ⌊ M a g i c L e v e l × 1 10 ⌋ + 1 {\displaystyle \lfloor MagicLevel\times {\frac {1}{10}}\rfloor +1}

Level Boost Level Boost Level Boost

14-19 +7 47-53 +12 80-86 +17
20-26 +8 54-59 +13 87-93 +18

A '''Castlewars brew''' is a [[potion]] exclusive to [[Castle Wars]]. It provides the boosts from a [[super combat potion]], a [[ranging potion]] and [[imbued heart]] at once.

==Effects==
Stat boosts to Attack, Strength and Defence are calculated with: <math>\lfloor SkillLevel \times \frac{15}{100} \rfloor + 5</math>. 
{{clear|left}}
Ranged boost is calculated with: <math>\lfloor RangedLevel \times \frac{1}{10} \rfloor + 4</math>
{{clear|left}}
Magic boost is calculated with: <math>\lfloor MagicLevel \times \frac{1}{10} \rfloor + 1</math>
